trends: There has been one other sighting in Slanesville
There were no other sightings in Slanesville on or around December 11th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsGetting ready to leave for work, I looked up and saw a glowing blue cigar-shaped object hovering in the sky. Sky was clear, cresent moon, and I believe Venus (to the left of the moon) were visible. A low humming noise was what brought my attention to it. I snapped a few zoomed in pics with my blackberry and rushed inside to wake my wife so she could see it. Upon return, the object was gone. Sky was still clear, and the humming noise had gone.
